effect.sun_moon: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: Makes the target act next this turn.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Makes the target act next this turn.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Makes the target act next this turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
